issue.title: Build a Book Library Management System
issue.body:
## Book Library Management System

Build a full-stack book library application with Next.js, SQLite database, and Playwright tests.

## Features

### 1. Book Management
- Add new books (title, author, ISBN, year, description)
- Edit existing books
- Delete books
- View book details

### 2. Search & Browse
- List all books with pagination
- Search books by title or author
- Filter by year

### 3. Borrowing System
- Mark book as borrowed/returned
- Track borrower name and date
- Show availability status

## Technical Stack

### Frontend (Next.js 14 App Router)
- `/` - Home page with book list
- `/books/[id]` - Book detail page
- `/books/new` - Add new book form
- `/books/[id]/edit` - Edit book form
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Server components where appropriate

### Backend (Next.js API Routes)
- `GET /api/books` - List books (with search/filter)
- `GET /api/books/[id]` - Get single book
- `POST /api/books` - Create book
- `PUT /api/books/[id]` - Update book
- `DELETE /api/books/[id]` - Delete book
- `POST /api/books/[id]/borrow` - Borrow book
- `POST /api/books/[id]/return` - Return book

### Database (SQLite with better-sqlite3)
- Books table: id, title, author, isbn, year, description, created_at
- Borrowings table: id, book_id, borrower_name, borrowed_at, returned_at

### Testing (Playwright)
- Test adding a new book
- Test searching for books
- Test borrowing and returning a book
- Test editing a book

## File Structure
```
app/
  layout.tsx
  page.tsx
  books/
    [id]/
      page.tsx
      edit/
        page.tsx
    new/
      page.tsx
  api/
    books/
      route.ts
      [id]/
        route.ts
        borrow/
          route.ts
        return/
          route.ts
lib/
  db.ts
components/
  BookCard.tsx
  BookForm.tsx
  SearchBar.tsx
tests/
  books.spec.ts
```

## Setup Files Needed
- package.json with dependencies
- tsconfig.json
- tailwind.config.ts
- next.config.js
- playwright.config.ts
- .gitignore

ems.task: Create all project setup files: .gitignore, package.json with dependencies (next, react, better-sqlite3, tailwindcss, playwright, @types/*), tsconfig.json, tailwind.config.ts, next.config.js, playwright.config.ts, and app/layout.tsx

analysisSummary: Build a full-stack book library management system with Next.js 14 App Router, SQLite database, and Playwright testing. Includes book CRUD operations, search/filter functionality, and a borrowing system.

pendingEMs.task: Build the database layer and all API endpoints. Owns lib/db.ts (database schema and connection) and the entire app/api/ directory with all route handlers for books CRUD and borrowing operations
Build all frontend UI including components (BookCard, BookForm, SearchBar) and page routes (home, book detail, new/edit forms). Owns the components/ directory and app/books/ directory
Write comprehensive Playwright E2E tests covering adding books, searching, borrowing/returning, and editing. Owns the tests/ directory and test configuration
